trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_SEQ_00<tab>Fukata hopes you enjoy foul odors.
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_TODO_00<tab>Sprinkle the bucket of smelly liquid at the designated locations.

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_000<tab>Hello there, traveler. I require your help if you have the time. While I belong to the Doman Liberation Front, I am also a proud resident of Namai with my own responsibilities to the village.

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_001<tab>I have been told to guard this spring and under no circumstances am I to leave my post. However, there is another job related to the village I need to take care of.
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_002<tab>I was hoping you might do it in my stead. Here, take this liquid and sprinkle it around that area over there. You have my thanks!
TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_010<tab>Pray sprinkle that liquid around that area over there. You have my thanks!

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_021<tab>No doubt you are wondering just why that liquid smells so foul. Well, it is made from a mix of pungent ingredients: animal innards, resin, and garlic to name but a few. It does a fantastic job of keeping the beasts at bay.

TEXT_STMBDZ401_02724_FUKATA_000_022<tab>One of my fellow rebels taught me how to make it. Oh, and you will want to give your clothes, let us see...three <var 1A 02 /var>thorough<var 1A 01 /var> scrubbings ought to do it.
